gameDetails.name: Twilight Inscription: The Council Keleres Faction
gameDetails.description:
A new faction card available as a free "Print & Play" version. Just print it and cut it out.

Council Patronage
Setup: On Navigation, claim the Mecatol Rex system and explore each system adjacent to it. Do not write your name on the Mecatol Rex sheet.

Once per strategy event, you can spend 2 Votes as 1 Trade Good.

Tribunii (Faction Asset)
Draw 1 tribune icon on any sheet that does not have one and claim any dotted asset there except Faction. When you would draw the fourth tribune, instead write your name in the topmost open slot on the Mecatol Rex sheet and triple its rewards.
